Description: Invoke a burst of flames with a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_FireMagic.FireStaff_PillarOfFire.Radius]}m</font> radius at the target area that deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Firestaff_Pillar.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_fire_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage. \n\nCosts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.FireStaff_PillarOfFire.ManaCost]}</font> Mana.

Pillar of Fire deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FireMagicAbilityTable.Upgrade_Firestaff_PillarofFire_Dmg.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> more damage for each stack of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">smolder</font> on the target.

Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FireMagicAbilityTable.Upgrade_Firestaff_PillarofFire_Mana.Mana * 100]}%</font> of your max mana per enemy hit by Pillar of Fire.

Meteor Shower gives you <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FireMagicAbilityTable.Upgrade_Firestaff_MeteorShower_Mana.Mana * 100]}%</font> of your max mana for each instance of damage dealt.

Hitting a target that is inside meteor shower with a light or heavy attack will inflict <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">smolder</font> on targets, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.FireStaff_Pyro_DOT.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_fire_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage each second for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.FireStaff_Pyro_DOT.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Adds <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">grit</font> while casting Meteor Shower.<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">\n\n(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)</font>

Cast forth a heavy fireball that deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Firestaff_Siege_AOE.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_fire_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage in a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_FireMagic.Spell_Ability_Firestaff_Fireball_ScorchedEarth.Radius]}m</font> radius on impact. \n\nCosts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.FireStaff_Siege.ManaCost]}</font> Mana.

Fireball hits now apply a stack of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">smolder</font> on targets, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.FireStaff_Pyro_DOT.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_fire_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage each second for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.FireStaff_Pyro_DOT.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Direct hits with Fireball give you <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FireMagicAbilityTable.Upgrade_Firestaff_Fireball_Mana.Mana * 100]}% </font>of your max mana and reduce your fire staff ability cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FireMagicAbilityTable.Upgrade_Firestaff_Fireball_Mana.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>.

Heavy attacks no longer consume <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">mana</font> and will now restore <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FireMagicAbilityTable.Passive_Firestaff_FireMage_ManaOnHit.Mana * 100]}%</font> of your max mana on hit.

Heavy attacks reduce fire staff cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FireMagicAbilityTable.Passive_Firestaff_FireMage_CDRHeavy.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font> on hit.

While holding a fire staff and above <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">50%</font> mana, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Firestaff_FireMage_DmgFullMana.DMGStandard * 100]}% empower</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Empower increases damage.)</font>

Heavy attacks now trigger a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_FireMagic.Spell_Heavy_Firestaff_Splash.Radius]}m</font> splash on impact, but the damage is reduced to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Firestaff_PrimaryAttackC2_Splash.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font>.

Light and Heavy attacks inflict a stack of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">smolder</font> on foes, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.FireStaff_Pyro_DOT.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_fire_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage each second for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.FireStaff_Pyro_DOT.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.FireStaff_Pyro_DOT.StackMax]} stacks.)</font>.

Your fire staff abilities gain an extra <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FireMagicAbilityTable.Passive_Firestaff_FireMage_Crit.CritChance * 100]}%</font> chance to critical strike.

After not taking damage from an attack in the last <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Firestaff_FireMage_DmgNoDmg_Timer.BaseDuration]}s</font>, deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Firestaff_FireMage_DmgNoDmg.DMGStandard * 100]}%</font> more damage.

While holding a fire staff, your critical strike damage is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FireMagicAbilityTable.Passive_Firestaff_FireMage_CritDmg.CritDamage * 100]}%</font>.

Using a fire staff ability places a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_FireMagic.Spell_Ultimate_Firemage.Radius]}m</font> rune on the ground that increases your damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ultimate_Firemage_DMG.DMGStandard * 100]}%</font> while standing inside. The rune lasts for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ultimate_Firemage.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Cooldown {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ultimate_Firemage_Timer.BaseDuration]}s)</font>.<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">\n\n(This effect cannot be dispelled.)</font>
Each hit of Incinerate causes an additional stack of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">smolder</font>.

Restore <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FireMagicAbilityTable.Upgrade_Firestaff_Incinerate_Heal.DmgPctToHealth * 100]}%</font> of Incinerate damage dealt as health.

Gain a stack of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Firestaff_incinerate_Empower.DMGStandard * 100]}%</font> empower for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Firestaff_incinerate_Empower.BaseDuration]}s</font> for each target hit with incinerate. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Firestaff_incinerate_Empower.StackMax]} stacks.)</font>

Create a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">4m</font> jet of flame from the staff dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.FireStaff_FlameThrower.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_fire_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage every second. Each hit inflicts a stack of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">smolder</font>, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.FireStaff_Pyro_DOT.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_fire_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage each second for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.FireStaff_Pyro_DOT.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.FireStaff_Pyro_DOT.StackMax]} stacks.)</font>\n\nCosts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.FireStaff_FlameThrower.ManaCost * 2]}</font> Mana per second.
Increase the range of Flamethrower by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">50%</font>.
Increase the base damage of Flamethrower by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FireMagicAbilityTable.Upgrade_Firestaff_FlameThrower_Dmg.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font>.

Flamethrower has no <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">cooldown</font> when canceled. While Flamethrower is active, being staggered will activate a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">2.5s</font> cooldown.

Dash forward up to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">18m</font> through targets dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.FireStaff_FireDash.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_fire_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage on hit. Passing through a target will inflict <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">smolder</font> on targets, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.FireStaff_Pyro_DOT.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_fire_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage each second for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.FireStaff_Pyro_DOT.BaseDuration]}s</font>. \n\nCosts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.FireStaff_Speed_Cost.ManaCost]}</font> Mana.

Fire staff cooldowns are reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FireMagicAbilityTable.Upgrade_Firestaff_BurnOut_CDR.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font> for each foe hit by Burn Out. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[FireMagicAbilityTable.Upgrade_Firestaff_BurnOut_CDR.NumberOfTrackedHits]} reductions per ability use.)</font>

Burn Out now triggers an explosion right as it ends dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.FireStaff_FireDash_Explosion.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_fire_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>damage to all targets in a 2.5m radius.

All attacks deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FireMagicAbilityTable.Passive_Firestaff_Pyro_DmgOnLow.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> increased damage against targets with <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">burn</font> or <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">smolder</font>.

Dodging through an enemy melee attack inflicts a stack of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">smolder</font> on foes, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.FireStaff_Pyro_DOT.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_fire_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage each second for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.FireStaff_Pyro_DOT.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.FireStaff_Pyro_DOT.StackMax]} stacks. {[FireMagicAbilityTable.Passive_Firestaff_Pyro_ManaOnblock.ActivationCooldown]}s Cooldown.)</font>.

Whenever a fire staff <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">smolder</font> effect deals damage, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Firestaff_Pyro_FortOnBurn.PhysicalArmor * 100]}% fortify</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Firestaff_Pyro_FortOnBurn.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Fortify increases armor)</font>

Applied <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">smolder</font> effects last <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FireMagicAbilityTable.Passive_Firestaff_Pyro_ManaOnBurn.TargetStatusEffectDurationMult * 100]}%</font> longer.

Critical hits with fire staff abilities inflict a stack of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">smolder</font>, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.FireStaff_Pyro_DOT.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_fire_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage each second for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.FireStaff_Pyro_DOT.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.FireStaff_Pyro_DOT.StackMax]} stacks.)</font>

When hitting a target within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FireMagicAbilityTable.Passive_Firestaff_Pyro_BurnNearby.DistFromDefender]}m</font> of player, create a field of fire around you dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Firestaff_Pyro_BurnNearby.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_fire_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage to all to nearby enemies in a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_FireMagic.Spell_Passive_Firestaff_Pyro_BurnNearby.Radius]}m</font> radius for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_FireMagic.Spell_Passive_Firestaff_Pyro_BurnNearby.Duration / 1000]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Cooldown {[Type_StatusEffectData.TrialByFireTimer.BaseDuration]}s.)</font>

When you activate a fire staff ability gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Firestaff_Pyro_Haste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Firestaff_Pyro_Haste.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Haste increases movement speed.) (Cooldown {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Firestaff_Pyro_Haste_Timer.BaseDuration]}s.)</font>

Hitting a target that is inflicted with <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FireMagicAbilityTable.Passive_Firestaff_Pyro_Ultimate.TargetStatusEffectStackSize]}</font> stacks of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">smolder</font> with a heavy attack will consume all of the stacks on the target. Upon consumption, an explosion will be triggered, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Firestaff_Ultimate_Explosion.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_fire_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage to all targets in a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_FireMagic.Spell_Ability_FireStaff_PyroUlt_Explosion.Radius]}m</font> radius of the target. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">({[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Firestaff_PyroUlt_Explosion_Timer.BaseDuration]}s Cooldown.)</font>
